item.title: TechCrunch Minute: Lockheed Martin rescues satellite manufacturer Terran Orbital
item.description: Lockheed Martin is acquiring satellite manufacturer Terran Orbital, taking the smaller company private and potentially rescuing it from running out of cash while facing of serious debt. item.title: African e-commerce company Jumia completes sale of secondary shares at $99.6M
item.description: Almost two weeks ago, TechCrunch reported that African e-commerce giant Jumia was planning to sell 20 million American depositary shares (ADSs) and raise over $100 million, given its share price of around $5.70 at the time. item.title: B. Riley’s stock rallies 26% after founder offers to buy rest of troubled bank for $7 a share
item.description: B. Riley Financial Inc.’s stock rallied 26% on Friday after Bryant R. Riley, the founder, chairman, co-chief executive and largest shareholder of the troubled investment bank, made an offer to buy the stock he doesn’t already own for $7 a share.
